food.question: I am long and yellow, monkeys love to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 📏 I'm longer than a grape!
💛 My skin is the color of the sun.
🐒 Monkeys peel me before eating.

food.question: I am round and red, and grow on trees. An apple a day keeps the doctor away, what am I?

hints.text: 🌳 I grow high up.
🍎 Snow White liked to eat me!
🥧 You can bake me into a pie.

food.question: I am white and good in milk. Sometimes I have chocolate chips in me. What am I?

hints.text: 🍪 I'm often served with something sweet.
🥛 You might dunk me in milk.
🔥 You have to bake me in an oven.

food.question: I am orange and crunchy. Bunnies love to eat me! What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 Rabbits eat me
🌱 I grow in the ground
👀 I can help you see better.

food.question: I am made from milk, and I'm cold and sweet. You can eat me with a spoon. What am I?

hints.text: 🥶 You keep me in the freezer.
🍨 You can put sprinkles on top!
🍦 I come in many different flavors.

food.question: I am a vegetable, and I can make you cry when you cut me. What am I?

hints.text: 🧅 I grow underground.
😭 You might cry when you chop me.
🍔 I'm often on burgers.

food.question: I am long and brown, and you dig me up from the ground. You can mash me or fry me. What am I?

hints.text: 🍟 You can make fries from me
🥔 I'm often served with butter.
🌎 I grow under the soil.

food.question: I am small and green, and I grow in a pod. You can eat me as a side dish. What am I?

hints.text: 🟢 I am the same color as grass.
👩‍🌾 Farmers plant me in rows.
🍲 I'm often cooked with butter and salt.

food.question: I am a drink that comes from a cow, and I help your bones grow big and strong. What am I?

hints.text: 🥛 You can pour me into a glass.
🐄 Baby cows drink me from their mothers.
🦴 I make your bones stronger.

food.question: I am a fruit with a fuzzy brown skin and a green inside. Birds do not have a hard time peeling me. What am I?

hints.text: 🥝 I have tiny black seeds inside.
🥝 My name is also a bird from New Zealand.
🇳🇿 I grow in New Zealand.

plant.question: I am green and grow in the ground. I give yummy snacks! What am I?

hints.text: 🌱 I need water and sunshine to grow.
🍎 You can eat me!
🌳 I can be very big

plant.question: I have pretty colors and smell so sweet. Bees love to visit me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌷 I bloom in the spring.
💐 People like to give me as a gift.
☀️ I need sunshine to make my colors bright.

plant.question: I am long and yellow and grow on a vine. Monkeys love to peel and eat me! What am I?

hints.text: 🐒 I'm a favorite snack for monkeys!
💛 I'm yellow when I'm ready to eat.
🌴 I grow in warm places.

plant.question: I have a prickly coat and grow in the desert. I can store water for a long time. What am I?

hints.text: 🌵 I can store lots of water.
🏜️ You find me in a dry, hot place.
🩹 Some kinds can help heal boo-boos!

plant.question: I am a big plant that has a thick trunk and branches. Birds and squirrels live in me. What am I?

hints.text: 🪵 I have bark on my outside.
🍁 My leaves change color in the fall.
🏠 I can be home to lots of animals.

plant.question: I am a small plant that grows in your yard. You can walk and play on me. What am I?

hints.text: ⚽ You can play games on me.
🌱 I am green and soft.
✂️ Sometimes I need to be cut.

plant.question: I grow in the water and have big leaves. Frogs like to sit on me. What am I?

hints.text: 🐸 Ribbit, ribbit!
🌸 Sometimes I have a pretty flower.
💧 I float on the water's surface.

plant.question: I’m a crunchy veggie that grows underground. Bunnies love me! What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 I'm orange!
🌱 My leafy green top sticks out of the ground.
🐰 I'm a yummy snack for rabbits.

plant.question: I am a climbing plant, I grow on walls and fences and have thorns! What am I?

hints.text: 🌹 I sometimes have beautiful flowers with a lovely smell.
🧱 You might see me growing on the side of a house.
🌵 Be careful, I have sharp spikes!

plant.question: I’m tall and have hard, brown, woody parts. My seeds can be used to make yummy treats at the movies! What am I?

hints.text: 🌳 I can live for a very long time!
🐿️ Squirrels love to bury my acorns
🍿 The treat starts with pop!
